Pre-Game Insights: Mexico national team trained in San Diego a week prior to the start of the Copa America.
Manager Jaime Lozano has to make cuts to the roster and is dealing with a goalkeeper injury.
Julio Gonzalez is expected to start in goal.

Possible lineup includes Julio Gonzalez, Jorge Sanchez/Brian Garcia, Cesar Montes, Johan Vazquez, Gerardo Arteaga, Edson Alvarez, Erick Sanchez/Carlos Rodriguez, Luis Chavez, Uriel Antuna, Julian Quinones, Santiago Gimenez.
